name: Place Info Extractor
description: Extracts place information from JSON data based on address, including latitude, longitude, and up to 3 types as individual fields in a single string output.
author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>

params.name: json_string
params.description: The JSON formatted string containing place data.

params.name: address
params.description: The address to match within the JSON data.
